titleStmt.title: Abners funerall, or, a sermon preached at the funerall of that learned and noble knight, Sir Thomas Lucie. By Robert Harris, B.D. and Pastor of the Church at Hanwell, Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Bartlet, and are to be sould at the signe of the Gilt Cup by Saint Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
